jd: Hi , Hope you doing good!! I’m a Technical Recruiter with Yochana IT Solutions, a national IT staffing solutions provider with 13 plus years of experience delivering value to leading companies across the U.S and Canada. I'm currently staffing for a Mobile Project Manager. Experience Below you will find the job description, if you are qualified and interested please send me your Updated Word Document Resume. My apologies if this position is not an ideal fit, we'll keep you in mind for other suitable positions and referrals would be appreciated. Job Title: Mobile Project ManagerLocation: Irvine, CA (hybrid 3 days onsite)Job Type: Contract Interview process: Telephonic/ Web Ex • Ideally should have past experience with Mobile apps ( iOS / Android) / B2B SAAS applications• strong Product skills needed, being able to create and manage mobile product roadmap, clearly understand articulate the problem statement, lead discovery of initiatives , capture requirements and create PRD’s.• work with UX design teams, engineering and cross functional teams for solutioning.• responsible for coordination with business stakeholders from C10 countries working through UAT launches, rollouts and post rollout support.• strong communication skills• manage Mobile Agile scrum teams - Manage healthy product backlog, run groomings, sprint plannings• strong documentation skills with Confluence,JIRA• Responsible for doing competitive analysis and work with research team to understand the customer needs and create a roadmap based on that.• Personality Traits- Product mentality (asks questions, probes to understand the problem statement and the use cases, needs to have a sense of ownership and urgency.
